attributes.review: Highly offensive, I was startled when having to verify my age and when I opened the app this hideous Cheeto of a man was on my screen and I couldn’t handle it anymore. I would rather die than have this app. Please get rid of it from all app stores.

First of all I open the app and a picture of a HUGE orange corn haired man was naked. It was absolutely disgusting. Then my phone kept playing gabbie Hannah’s rapping. It would only rap when I opened the app. Horrible quality and super slow!!!! Big Cheeto guy has a son we neeeed to save him!!!!
attributes.title: big orange man scares me

attributes.review: First of all when I open the app all I saw was it orange Chido that’s not even the regular orange color nobody likes Trump so what’s the point to make an epic know I’d like so nobody likes him and when I first open app all I saw was an orange Chito mix with a orange potato those do not go together at all
attributes.title: Review

attributes.review: My phone explorer from the amount of Cheeto overload and I am now using my pillow to wrote this review. :( I don’t have money to replace my phone that this app 100% destroyed I am expecting Cheeto man to come through with another stimulus check and a refund for my phone.

From the start this app gave me problems always just telling lies and giving horrible information. To be honest many many other apps are sooo much better. I’m disappointed and wanna go watch bts to cheer me up byeeeeeeee
attributes.title: Awful app

attributes.review: This app is horrible as soon as I opened it it showed trumps small peen on the screen 🤢🤮and when I was using the app it kept logging me out of it this app is a one star it is horrible it needs to be took off the App Store ASAP No rocky
attributes.title: This app is horrible

attributes.review: i accidentally downloaded this app onto my phone and now i have a virus 😳. i think the virus is spreading from my phone to me bc whenever i see the icon one of my teeth fall out so pretty soon i’m just going to be sitting here like 👁➖👁and thats not very cash money if you ask me. the dumb virus won’t let me delete the app so i’m trying to pray to our lord and savior bernie sanders to help me out so if you are reading this please pray for me bc it’s very much needed      🥺👉🏻👈🏻.
attributes.title: trump’s left but 😔

attributes.review: First this app made my sister phone blow up and it makes ur head hurt when u open the app also it’s making people go blind 😡 this app is very bad it shouldn’t be on here it’s giving people bad nightmares and it’s not a good app to have on anything

I downloaded the app and my pet dinosaur along with my Area 51 alien got sucked into the screen. I want my pets back😿. when I got it my phone was really glitchy and it turned the screen orange...ew. my life has been a disaster since Cheeto came here. this is not okay😾
attributes.title: no good.

attributes.review: i opened the app and all of a sudden this naked cheeto man started dancing. i was just trying to show my pet t. rex how to work the app and she got so scared that she died😔now, not only did my eyes have to be scarred by watching a naked cheeto dance, i no longer have a pet t. rex. 0/10 recommend.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE TERRIBLE APP
